name: GIWL (Guaranteed Issue Whole Life)
features: Guaranteed issue whole life final expense
No medical exam—acceptance based on simplified disease questions
All applicants age 50–85 eligible unless specific disqualifying condition
Immediate full death benefit for eligible conditions

name: EIWL (Express Issue Whole Life)
features: Express issue whole life final expense
No exam if no disqualifying condition within 12 months for core diseases
Simplified underwriting based on condition‐and‐timeframe matrix
Full death benefit once eligible, with possible rating for recent conditions

name: Deluxe Term
features: Simplified issue term life
Underwriting approval based on no treatment or diagnosis in past 2 years for most conditions
Coverage for ages 18–85 (subject to state approval)
Term renewable annually to age 85 with no additional exam

name: Deluxe (Permanent Whole Life)
features: Permanent whole life final expense
Condition acceptance if treated >2 years ago for most impairments
Guaranteed level death benefit
No exam, simplified disease questionnaire

name: Premier Term
features: Preferred‐class term life
Acceptance only if no disease treatment in past 5 years for major conditions
Simplified underwriting for ages 18–85
Renewable annually to age 85

name: Provider (Preferred Whole Life)
features: Preferred‐class whole life final expense
High underwriting standards—only well‐controlled conditions >5 years accepted
No exam; physician statement may be required for ambiguous cases
Guaranteed level death benefit
